K12ganphrdu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
K12ganphrdu:3: gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ /
K12ganphrdu:4: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma //
K12ganphrdu:5: yaḥ kaścit kulaputra ānanda imāni gaṇapatihṛdayāni dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati tasya sarvāṇi kāryasiddhāni bhaviṣyanti
K12ganphrdu:7: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
K12ganphrdu:12: oṃ kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa dara dara vidara vidara hana hana gṛhṇa gṛhṇa dhāva dhāva bhañja bhañja jambha jambha tambha (Gph_11)
K12ganphrdu:13: tambha stambha stambha moha moha deha deha dadāpaya dadāpaya dhanasiddhi me prayaccha /
K12ganphrdu:18: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
K12ganphrdu:27: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
K12ganphrdu:28: yaḥ kaścit kāryam ālabhate mantrasādhanaṃ vā triratnapūjaṃ vā deśāntaragamanaṃ vā
K12ganphrdu:29: rājakulagamanaṃ vā antardhānaṃ vā tena buddhabhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā āryagaṇapatihṛdayaṃ
K12ganphrdu:30: saptavārānucārayitavyaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tasya sidhyante nātra śaṃsayaḥ /
K12ganphrdu:32: dinedine kalpam utthāya sarvasaptavārānucārayitavyaṃ mahāsaubhāge bhaviṣyati /
K12ganphrdu:36: na kaścid eva tārapradakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyate bhṛṅgo 'vatāraṃ lapsyati na cāsya bodhicittottarāyā bhaviṣyanti /
K12ganphrdu:38: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
